level.heading: Public education program.
level.text: The Chief shall carry on a suitable publicity program designed to inform the citizens of the District of the provisions of this unit and the rights and obligations created by it.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Sept. 24, 1976, D.C. Law 1-85, title VII, ยง 707, DCR 2464.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 7-2501.01.
